schedule.name: Working in Finland as an International Student
schedule.description: All the basic things you need to know about working in Finland as an International Student
schedule.fullDescription:
An hour long info about the basic things you need to know about working in Finalnd as an international student.

A The Workshop is directed especially to the International Students of Kumpula.

TE Services (http://www.te-palvelut.fi/te/en/)

Alumni speaker: Shubham Kapoor, Cloud & HPC System Specialist, CSC

Alumni speaker: Ayesha Ahmad, Senior Developer, Ericsson

schedule.name: Coach Cafe - HY Alumnit
schedule.fullDescription:
SIGN UP: https://www.lyyti.in/Kumpulan_Potentiaali_2018_CoachCafe .
 
CoachCafe - the best tips for finding a job! Are you in the need tips for your career development or do you reconsider a new direction in your career?  

CoachCafe is a half an hour laid back conversation with a mentor and 3-7 students in each group, where the mentor and the students will 
exchange their views and exepriences on the topics they choose..

The group will meet from 13:00 to 13:30 and 13:30 to 14:00 at Exactum B121. You can join 1-2 groups (note the timetables). Two groups are in english. Gorups and the sign up form are listed below. Sign up for this form before 20.11. Notice that registration is binding.

schedule.name: Columbia Road
schedule.description: Growth Hacking Is the New Agile
schedule.fullDescription:
We always say that Growth Hacking is the new Agile. But what is it 
actually, and why does it matter?

Too often Growth Hacking is thought of as outside-of-the-box marketing 
when in reality it's huge shift in the ways modern companies make 
revenue. Those companies that will want to hire you in a few years. 

Growth Hacking is a way of working that will change how developers, 
analysts and marketers work in future. To stay current, developers and 
analysts cannot crunch code or numbers in a black box, and marketers 
need to get into loving data fast. Growth Hacking is the framework that 
ties everyone together into a multidisciplinary, high-performing team 
with power to make a change. 

In this keynote you'll learn the priciples of Growth Hacking, what a 
Growth Hacking team looks like and does, and what the results of Growth 
Hacking can look like. 

Be a forerunner. Become more than an implementer. Learn Growth Hacking.

schedule.name: IBM
schedule.fullDescription:
Workshopissa käydään läpi, mikä on IBM Watson ja mihin se taipuu 
käytännössä. Workshop sisältää erilaisia demoja Watsonista ja paikan 
päällä näytetään, kuinka tekoälyä opetetaan puhumaan ja näkemään 
Osallistujat voivat ottaa omat läppärit mukaan.

schedule.name: Urapalvelut HY harjoitteluinfo
schedule.fullDescription: Infoissa saat tietoa harjoittelun suorittamisesta, Helsingin yliopiston harjoittelutuen haun käytännöistä sekä muista harjoitteluun liittyvistä kysymyksistä.

schedule.name: TEK & Loimu
schedule.fullDescription:
Mietitkö joskus minkälaisen palkkatoiveen voit laittaa hakemukseen? Tai 
millä perusteilla voisit pyytää palkankorotusta? Tämän keynoten aikana 
pureudutaan palkkasuosituksiin ja siihen millä perusteillä sinun tulee 
saada tietyn tasoista palkkaa.

schedule.name: Foreca
schedule.description: ROAD WEATHER MODELING for autonomous vehicles - HOW DO WE DO IT?
schedule.fullDescription:
Presentation starts with the basics of road weather forecasting followed
 by some examples of road weather use cases. We finish by touching on 
the differences between forecasting for humans vs. forecasting for 
computers, in particular the computers in a connected vehicle.

schedule.name: CSC
schedule.fullDescription:
What is a supercomputer, and what are they good for? In this interactive
 presentation session, we will discuss the largest computer 
installations in the past, present and future, their purpose, outlook 
and the impact of supercomputer simulations and extreme-scale data 
analysis in today's scientific research.

schedule.name: OP
schedule.description: What does a theoretical physicist do in a bank?

schedule.name: Webscale
schedule.description: Going real time in a webscale micro services architecture
schedule.fullDescription:
Best practises of messaging patterns in distributed systems like micro 
services applications and how to achieve realtime push messaging to 
clients with AWS AppSync. Presention

schedule.name: Perfektio
schedule.description: Liiketoiminnan muodostaminen tieteellisistä tai teknologisista oivalluksista
schedule.fullDescription:
Liiketoiminnan muodostaminen tieteellisistä tai teknologisista 
oivalluksista 

Mitä on 'deep tech' ja miksi minua pitäisi kiinnostaa?
Monilla teknologisilla aloilla tieteellinen tutkimus kulkee hyvin 
lähellä kaupallisia sovellutuksia. Tutkijan uran ja suurten yritysten 
prosesseihin hukkumisen sijaan voi pohtia oman tieteellisen intohimon 
soveltamista suoraan uutena alkavaan liiketoimintaan. Tällöin puhutaan 
usein startupeista. Mutta miten lähestyä startup-maailmaa jos pelkkä 
sana 'pöhinä' aiheuttaa näppylöitä?

Keynote pitää sisällään case-esimerkin deep tech startupista (Neuroflux 
Oy), sisältäen sen alkutaipaleen vaiheet ja opit sekä ajatuksia miten 
lähteä testaamaan oman oivalluksen potentiaalia.

Puhujana: Henri Malkki (Perustaja ja toimitusjohtaja - Perfektio Oy / 
Neuvonantaja ja hallituksen jäsen - Neuroflux Oy)

schedule.name: Kesko Oyj
schedule.description: K AI: How K Group uses machine learning to create personalized recipe recommendations
schedule.fullDescription:
Combining online and offline data provides a great opportunity to 
generalize detailed information of identified online customers to the 
entire customer database. This session presents a practical example on 
how K Group creates recipe recommendations to all of their customers by 
applying machine learning techniques to a combination of online and 
offline data. The speaker will also give a brief overview of K Groups 
technical environment for data processing, machine learning and output 
delivery to various channels.
